name: Number Match
summary:
Number Match is an easy number addition puzzle game that anyone can play. Train your concentration and logic and try to beat your best score!

Playing addictive number matching games will not only benefit your mental health, but will also help you unwind, especially after a hard day.
Number Match is an easy and fun math game to wake up your sleeping brain! Combine numbers to clear the game board. There are so many ways to solve number puzzles, but it's not as easy as it seems.
Have fun exercising your brain with Number Match - number addition puzzles! Play number games anytime, anywhere!
